name: Cavatappi Pasta Salad with Tuna and Olives
author: karabear8317
summary: This is a great macaroni salad with cavatappi pasta I started making a few years back and is now requested at every event I attend. So simple, yet delicious!
ingredients: kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add cavatappi and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 9 to 10 minutes
Drain and run under cold water until no longer hot
Drain again and transfer to a big bowl
Add mayonnaise, tuna, olives, celery, onion, salt, and pepper to the pasta; toss until fully combined
Serve immediately or chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve
